title: condensed
content:
Hello, this is Matt Willey's Timmons typeface, I love this font as well as MFred. Are there any similar fonts on the market? I don't think these are for sale.

thanks!!http://mattwilley.co.uk/filter/Type/MFred-Typeface

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-06-27 at 11.09.42 AM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-27%20at%2011.09.42%20AM.jpg) | 64.02 KB |
| [Screen Shot 2014-06-27 at 11.06.44 AM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-27%20at%2011.06.44%20AM.jpg) | 76.39 KB |
author: martipoirier

comments.content:
MFred is available to sell at typespec: [http://typespec.co.uk/mfred-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/typespec.co.uk/mfred-font "http://typespec.co.uk/mfred-font")  
 [Glenlake](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/glenlake) might be an alternative.  
For Timmons, some suggestions: [Uncle Sam](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/uncle-sam-slim-nf), [Chamfer Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/chamfer-gothic-rr), [Don't Mess With Vikings](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/doubletwo/xxii-dont-mess-with-vikings), [Herald Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/herald-gothic), [Five Star Final](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/five-star-final), [CWM](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073059/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.playtype.com/font/cwm)
